title: NEW: IYES – So Crazy
body:
It’s been a little while since we last heard from everyone’s favourite Brighton duo **IYES**, but they’ve just returned with new track _So Crazy_ and it’s an excellent return to form.

With hints of dance music strewn throughout, the duo have taken their now established electro pop sound and made it ripe for both the radio and the dance floor alike – I’m expecting to see a few remixes popping up soon. A great combination of swirling synths and sharpened vocal hooks, _So Crazy_ has certainly wet the appetite for more. Stream it below:

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
